Hi David,

On 2/20/07, David Saff <saff@...> wrote:
>  Just a quick survey--anyone out there running an open-source project
>  making significant use of JUnit 4 features?  Custom runners?  Thanks,

We are using a custom JUnit 4 runner to integrate JDave
(http://www.laughingpanda.org/projects/jdave) with IDEs.

Lasse
